Title: Rajaraja Cholan
Notes on setting: Tamil , About the life history of great king Raja Raja Chola

Title: Veerapandiya Kattabomman
Notes on setting: Tamil , About the life history of great king Veerapandiya Kattabomman who struggled against British people from Tamil Nadu

Title: Veer Savarkar
Notes on setting: about life and times of great revolutionary Swatantryaveer Vinayak Damodar Savarkar

Title: Siddhartha
Notes on setting: about the life of a boy and his search for a meaningful way of life

Title: Khamosh Pani
Notes on setting: about a widowed mother and her young son set in a late 1970s village in Punjab , Pakistan which is coming under radical influence

Title: Gautama Buddha
Notes on setting: about the life of Gautama Buddha

Title: Amrapali
Notes on setting: based on the life of Ambapali in India

Title: Sikandar
Notes on setting: Indian-made film set in 326 BC , after Alexander the Great has conquered Persia and pertains to his conquest of the kingdoms of Pauravas ( in modern Pakistan and northwest India )

Title: Asoka
Notes on setting: fictionalized account of the reign of Ashoka ( r. ) , of the Mauryan Empire in India

Title: Mayura
Notes on setting: Kannada film based on the Kadamba Dynasty 's King Mayurasharma set in India

Title: Ambikapathy
Notes on setting: Tamil , a love story set in India in 1083

Title: Urumi
Notes on setting: Malayalam , historical fiction on Portuguese in Malabar

Title: Mughal-e-Azam
Notes on setting: Bollywood film telling a story set during the Mughal Empire , depicting conflict between King Akbar and his son Crown Prince Salim over Anarkali

Title: Jodha-Akbar
Notes on setting: Bollywood film set during the reign of Mughal Emperor Akbar ( r. 1556-1605 ) , depicts his marriage to a Hindu Rajput princess Jodhaa Bai . Directed by Ashutosh Gowariker , and stars Hrithik Roshan and Aishwarya Rai in the title roles

Title: Taj Mahal : An Eternal Love Story
Notes on setting: Directed by Akbar Khan . This movie entails the story of Shah Jahan ( r. 1627-58 ) and his Queen Mumtaz Mahal ( 1593-1631 ) . Mumtaz was the love of Shah Jahan 's life , and the monument this Mughal emperor built to honour his deceased love was the Taj Mahal ( constructed from 1632 to 1653 )

Title: Paradesi
Notes on setting: Directed by Bala . This movie is based on the lives affected by plantation

Title: The Deceivers
Notes on setting: about Thugees in India in 1825

Title: Veer
Notes on setting: set during the 1825 Pindari movement of Rajasthan , when India was ruled by the British . Directed by Anil Sharma stars Salman Khan in lerole

Title: Shatranj Ke Khiladi
Notes on setting: ( The Chess Players , 1977 ) entailing the East India Company 's annexation of the kingdom of Oudh ( Awadh ) from Wajid Ali Shah in 1856 on the eve of the Sepoy Mutiny

Title: Junoon
Notes on setting: about a love story between one of the Rebels of 1857 in Rohilkhand and an Anglo-Indian woman that he has held hostage ( along with her mother and grandmother )
